author: benjaminchodroff
content:
Today is the last day to submit a set withdrawal address using CLWP before we close submissions to GitHub on 2/28. If your validator seed phrase has not been stored securely at all times, please consider using CLWP:
https://github.com/benjaminchodroff/ConsensusLayerWithdrawalProtection

After 2/28, we will still allow submissions via Kleros curate moderated list - which requires staking 0.474 ETH (refunded after one week if valid):
https://curate.kleros.io/tcr/1/0x479083b5343aB89bb39608e3176D750c8A6957B5

We will stop moderating Kleros submissions 14 days prior to mainnet Capella, but submit early as community members may start loading the GitHub submissions earlier. Feel free to check if your validator is compromised by searching the 1724+ submissions for your index number.
